definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: It is only a magic weapon for petrochemical enterprise to be stable long time.
sentences.chinese: 安全文化是石化企业长治久安的唯一法宝。

sentences.english: Whether Saab will survive in the long term is less clear.
sentences.chinese: 萨博能否长治久安尚不明朗。

sentences.english: How in-depth public opinion, meaning people can shun long-term stability.
sentences.chinese: 如何深入民意，顺意民心才可以长治久安。

sentences.english: Without the rule of law, there will not be long-term order and security.
sentences.chinese: 不实行法制，社会难以实现长治久安。

sentences.english: In order to defend the social stability and security, police should be armed with science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 为维护社会的长治久安，应提倡科技兴警。

sentences.english: The seas and oceans bear on the enduring peace, lasting stability and sustainable development of China.
sentences.chinese: 海洋关系国家长治久安和可持续发展。

sentences.english: Law is the principal factor that can keep a country lastingly stable and peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 法律是一个国家维持长治久安的主要条件。

definition: to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
to bring peace and stability to the country
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
efficient government, people at peace (idiom); all is well with the state and the people
rule by virtue/rule by setting virtuous example (Confucian ideal)
that which is yearned for by the public
